comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Julia Nalle Gregory (1868-1952). Her husband, Thomas Watt Gregory (1861-1933) was Attorney General of the US under Wilson. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Watt_Gregory www.tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/fgr53 Her gravesite: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=55726398

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Thank you for the full name of T. W. Gregory as well as the additional information on Julia Nalle.  We will update the description data with the full name.
